title: Bert Newton's IMT [Live from HMAS Cerberus]
subject_group: Armed Forces, Military, War & Weapons/Australia - Armed forces
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Television programs - Australia

Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Advertising - Australia
description: A record of the IMT live broadcast from HMAS Cerburus during Navy Week in 1970 which includes commercials. Bert Newton is joined by Lucky Star; Gaynor Bunning; Tim Evans; Johnny Walker; Alison Durban; Judy Scott; Bettina and Bryce; Miss Teen America and Patti McGrath. Commercials include: Yalumba Brandivino; Mastercut butchers; Victa mowers (Pete Smith); National vacuum cleaners; Yates lawn seeds; Remy Martin Brandy; Benson & Hedges cigarettes (Stuart Wagstaff); Capitol bread; SPC canned fruit; Ponds face cream; Ponds busy girl instant shampoo; State Savings Bank; Kraft 'quick n easy' dried peas (Bruce Mansfield); Cedel anti-perspirent; Monash cigarettes; Gold Medallion homes; Lipton tea bags.
